Wondrous item, rare
This wide, wooden plank holds hundreds of two-inch long needle-like spikes. When you finish a long rest on the bed, you have resistance to piercing damage and advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain your concentration on spells you cast for 8 hours or until you finish a short or long rest.
